TITLE: Trump, defiant on tariffs, claims trade deals are in the works
SUMMARY: The president is foreshadowing deals with multiple trading partners in an apparent effort to quell economic anxiety and prove his tariff plan is working.

TITLE: US markets have spiraled. Americans had doubts about Trump’s tariffs before that.
SUMMARY: Recent polls showed Americans were wary of tariffs, even before the president launched his plan to realign the global trade order.

TITLE: Trump says tariff policies ‘WILL NEVER CHANGE’ amid plunging stocks, Chinese response
SUMMARY: The president’s sweeping tariff plan has thrown markets into chaos and risks sparking a global trade war.

TITLE: ‘There are no guarantees’: Scott Bessent won't rule out a recession
SUMMARY: He also said he isn’t worried about stock market turbulence, following the worst week in the market in two years.

TITLE: Trump’s business acumen has long been his armor. It’s being put to the test.
SUMMARY: The normally bullish Trump over the weekend declined to rule out the possibility of a full-blown recession as his tariff policies threaten to spark a massive global trade war.

TITLE: Trump won't rule out a recession in 2025
SUMMARY: "I hate to predict things like that," Trump said when pressed about the possibility of a recession during a recorded interview that aired on "Sunday Morning Futures with Maria Bartiromo."

TITLE: ‘He Finally Shot the Hostage’: Trump’s Trade War Is a Brutal Reality Check
SUMMARY: Trump imposing new tariffs on top of broader policy uncertainty will mean a hit to growth. The question is how large of a hit it will ultimately be.

TITLE: What Antitrust ‘Reformers’ Got Wrong
SUMMARY: Lina Khan and her allies tried to remake antitrust law. Trump’s team is likely putting an end to that.

TITLE: 7 things to watch for during Trump’s joint address to Congress
SUMMARY: Look for a more emboldened president compared to the Trump of 2017.

TITLE: Beijing’s deflation dilemma: Falling prices signal bigger troubles ahead for China’s economy
SUMMARY: Such challenges are the backdrop to the annual session of China’s parliament.
